lead_paragraph: Macbeth, a duke of Scotland, receives a prophecy from three witches that he will one day become the king of Scotland. Consumed by his ambition, he kills the king in order to take the throne for himself.
snippet: Macbeth, a duke of Scotland, receives a prophecy from three witches that he will one day become the king of Scotland. Consumed by his ambition, he kills the king in order to take the throne for himself.
